name: Fruit Line Challenges
description:
Fruits Line is the best Free game 2015. This is a kind of swiped fruits which is match-3 puzzle game and very attractive connect lines puzzle game!
This is also a very challenging game to practice reaction speed. Fruits Line is a legend of fruits puzzle and casual game which is suitable for kids, toddlers, phone and tablet.
Connect colorful lines of fruit to solve hard levels in this puzzle adventure!
Clear three or more same fruits to score points, try to use game props to make more combo! Play amazing and tasty Fruits Line Legend!
Fruits Line FEATURES:
- Use Knife to cut fruit same ninja fruit to fruit slice and get more score normal.
- More than 20 challenging levels & many game props.
- The Knife props can eliminate fruits in one row.
- Delicious and juicy fruits.
- Master five challenging gameplay modes, including high score, free the fruit, and fruit drop!
- Sweet and delicious graphic and cool animation effects.
- explore juicy jungles, mouth-watering mountains, delectable deserts, and more!
How to play:
1. Connect three or more same fruits to score points.
2. Archive the target points to level up.
3. Eliminate the more fruits quickly can get extra scores.
TIPS:
- Knife to fruit slice, get more score normal, but avoid bomb, poisoned apple.
- Bomb to BUST fruit break base on line
- Poisoned apple will prevent line fruits and fruit slice
- Hourglass countdown to rush you get more score
Fruit Line Legend is cloned by Fruit Splash, but have more challenging with knife slice fruits,fruit boom, poisoned apple and fruit infected.
Splash the Fruits!Play amazing and tasty Fruit Rescue - Fruit Line !
Want a relaxing game for a while? Fruit Line is your choice, it is a simple and addict game for relax.
You swipe and make longest chain of same fruits in this game with exciting special powers.
There are different targets in each level, you collect fruit chains to fill these targets, when all of the targets for a level are removed, you pass this level.
This game will give you a feeling of relax while playing, so have a try, don't miss the fun that it can bring to you.

Come and join in an easy joy! Let the cute fruit brighten up your day!
